main.name: Abirami Manisa
main.description: A goal-oriented and dynamic engineer, seeking a challenging role that will promote both professional and personal advancement as well as the company's evolution.
main.bio: A goal-oriented and dynamic Full Stack Developer, with experience in web and desktop application development. Exemplifies commitment to continual skill and knowledge improvement through comprehensive software engineering exposure. Highly analytical and organized in delivering high-quality work while orchestrating a wide variety of duties in a fastâ€“paced environment. Effective team player with strong interpersonal abilities and a commitment to professionalism.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Senior Front-End developer with experience in creating applications using React Framework.

testimonials.user: Aji Gopal - Team Lead - Kalycito Infotech Private Limited
testimonials.text: "Abi consistently gave 100 percent effort to the team and played a significant role in ensuring that we completed assignments on time. Her energy to make things happen was contagious and it helped us achieve great goals. Abi would become an appreciated member of any team"

testimonials.user: Palanikkumar - Professor - Dr NGP Institute of Technology
testimonials.text: "Known Abirami as an enthusiastic student from the very first day I taught her Python when she was in her First year. I have seen her grow with talent and discipline during her college days. She had been consistent in her grades and I liked her excellence in classical dance. I will always remember her fondly as she is a great example of how an ideal student should be. Having known her skills, I highly endorse it and wish her great luck in all her future endeavors."
